content: Hello guys. So I was executing a program that I have created with rust. After running cargo run, it outputs one line with the following: "note: run with RUST_BACKTRACE=1 environment variable to display a backtrace". So, yeah, I was interested in seeing the backtrace. So I put RUST_BACKTRACE=1 in console and execute it, I checked with echo and the variable seems like it is set. However, when I run: cargo run, again, it does not seem to work. It outputs exactly the same thing. Will somebody please help me :)
Oh, it did work! Thanks a lot. :) So thankful!
Ricardo Graça has marked this topic as resolved.
Or export RUST_BACKTRACE=1. Without export it's only set for your shell.
